jdbcService.sql: insert into component_child ( id, db_created_utc, db_modified_utc, min_occurs, max_occurs, parent_template_id, parent_anchor_id, parent_id, child_id, component_action_id, component_load_type_id ) values ( :id, timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), timezone ('UTC', current_timestamp), :minOccurs, :maxOccurs, :parentTemplateId, :parentAnchorId, :parentId, :childId, :componentActionId, :componentLoadTypeId )
